scenario_text.value: Oh, hey, Kunemon.
What are you doing by yourself? Where’s Ryo?
Kew, kew...

Oh, sorry. I still can’t tell what you’re
saying. Wait, I think I can guess, though.
Ryo must still be in bad shape, huh?
Is that why you decided to go out for a walk?

Man, if only there was some way for us to
communicate.
Oh, I know! Why don’t you try using gestures?
Kewkew?

Haha, yeah, the way you’re tilting your head
like that I can totally understand.

How can I put this... Why don’t you try using
movements to show me what you’re thinking?
Kew...kew!
There, that’s a nod! This might just work.
(Okay, what should I ask him?)
Why are you here?
Where are you going?
Why’d you leave Ryo?
Have you seen Agumon?
Why are you here?
What is it that brings you here, Kunemon?
Kewww. Kewkew.

What the heck? A circle? No, something big?
Or is that some kind of outline?
Hmm... Sorry, I don’t get it.
Where are you going?

Is there something you want to do here, or
are you heading somewhere else?
Kew!
Oh, he’s pointing! That’s easy enough to get.

Let’s see, that way would lead to...the
shrine? Why do you want to go there?
Kew, kew...

Hmm, what’s he doing now? Shaking his head...
Staying alert? Looking for something?
Hmm... Sorry, I don’t get it.
Why’d you leave Ryo?

Are you sure it was safe to leave Ryo? I know
he’s in rough shape, but should he be alone?
Kew...

Oh, I’m sorry! I’m not blaming you, no need
to look so upset.

After all, the others are in the school too,
so it’s a lot safer in there than outside.

And I’m sure there are times you’d like to be
alone.

Hey, that reminds me, Agumon and some of the
others are missing too.
Have you seen Agumon?

Hey, Kunemon, have you seen Agumon or
any of the others? We’re looking for them.
Kew!

What? Doesn’t that go...to the shrine? You
mean that’s where they all went?
Kew!
But...why? What’s there to do at the shrine?
(Was there anything else I wanted to ask?)
That’s all.
There’s more.
Kewkew!
Uh, what? Are you saying I should follow you?

I don’t know...I feel like going into the
forest without Agumon would be dangerous...

But if that’s where Agumon and the others
are, I would like to go bring them back.

Right, that settles it. Take me to Agumon and
the others.
Kewee!
Take me to Agumon and the others.
Kewee!
